before-robot.title: Site and Robot Selection
before-robot.content: Explore whether you can run a study in the site with your specific robot.

before-robot.title: Physical Robot Setup
before-robot.shortContent: safe robot transport to the site
before-robot.content:
• safe robot transport to the site
  • Try out wifi connection/setup in multiple locations
  • figure out and test charging/batteries + wiring

before-robot.title: Robot Programming
before-robot.content:
• Equip and test the robot for obstacle detection
  • Test Emergency shut-down procedure
  • Plan for potential collisions despite obstacle detection.
  • Implement protocols for the robot to maintain a safe distance
  • Avoid collisions with people, pets, and objects.
  • Consider mobility aids, such as wheelchairs or canes.

before-robot.title: Site Pre-Testing
before-robot.content:
• Run small pre-tests with the robot on-site
  • Verify you are collecting the right data

before-robot.title: A priori information/resources for robot
before-robot.content:
• Acquire maps
  • Necessary dictionaries etc. for semantic information
  • Ensure code for data storage
  • Develop or check remote monitoring software
  • may need map creation (LIDAR)

before-robot.title: Site Visit
before-robot.content:
• Conduct site visits to explore how the robot will move in the space, identify challenging areas
  • Set when to do the site visit
  • areas for charging, potential issues (e.g., escalators, elevators, blocked areas, ramp access, are sounds actually working in local setting, etc.)
  • Test with people to see potential conflicts?
  • Test at nightime with no people to perform LIDAR mapping?

during-robot.title: Data Recording
during-robot.content: Sensor data logging and performance metrics

during-researchers.title: Data Collection
during-researchers.content: Active observation and participant interviews,Active observation and participant interviews,Active observation and participant interviews,Active observation and participant interviews,Active observation and participant interviews

during-researchers.title: Preliminary Analysis
during-researchers.content: Initial data coding and pattern identification

during-researchers.title: Public Safety
during-researchers.content: Ongoing safety monitoring and incident reporting

during-public.title: Public Safety
